channel.title: CVE Feed for Nick Halsey -- Floating Social Media Links

item.title: CVE-2024-37545|2024-07-21T07:02:27.626Z -- nick%20halsey -- floating%20social%20media%20links
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nick Halsey Floating Social Media Links allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Floating Social Media Links: from n/a through 1.5.2.
